subject: Re: Re: Pedal plate missing
description_text: Hello, i still haven't received the pedal plate or any tracking information on the delivery, could you make sure it is on the way?

conversations.body_text:
Hello, i would like to know if the problem has been checked and if the product has been shipped, i did receive and email but i still have no tracking code or any confirmation.

Thank you
Hi Filipe Cunha,     Here is the SF International tracking number. The package was shipped on June 7th.  SF3172442478434
